pages.title: Artifacts
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Artifacts$() are a crucial part of your Vault Hunting journey, being the key to accessing the $(#033dfc)Final Vault$().$(br2)Your Goal is to collect all $(#033dfc)25 unique Artifacts$() and to solve the Artifact Puzzle.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Artifacts$() can be obtained through completing $(#033dfc)Vaults$() with a small chance in Crates, being the $(#033dfc)Winner of the Weekly Challenge$() or Crafting it with $(#033dfc)Artifact Fragments$() or via Sparks & Omega Pogs.

pages.title: The Puzzle
pages.text: To complete the Puzzle, you have to order all $(#033dfc)Artifacts$() so that they properly match with eachother.$(br)Once thats done, you need to blow up the $(#033dfc)Artifacts$() to receive a Final Vault Frame with any explosive.
